name: botbuilder-prompts
author: stevenic@microsoft.com
description: Lightweight prompt system for Bot Builder v4.

scripts.build-docs: typedoc --theme markdown --entryPoint botbuilder-prompts --excludePrivate --includeDeclarations --ignoreCompilerErrors --module amd --out ..\..\doc\botbuilder-prompts .\lib\index.d.ts --hideGenerator --name "Bot Builder SDK - Prompts" --readme none
